snippet.title: Brawlout – Release Date Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Brawlout – Available 21st August, 2018

Yooka-Laylee is entering the fray alongside Hyper Light Drifter and Juan from Guacamelee!

A new challenger has appeared in the platform fighter arena! 
Brawlout is the party fighting game, with couch and online play modes, blending platform fighter mechanics and traditional fighting game play into a stylish and fluid battle royale.

More info on http://www.brawlout.com

© 2018 Angry Mob Games. 
Hyper Light Drifter © 2018 Heart Machine LLC. 
Guacamelee! © 2018 Drinkbox Studios Inc.
Yooka-Laylee © 2018 Playtonic Limited.
